Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Activity \Ac*tiv"i*ty\, n.; pl. {Activities}. [Cf. F. activit['e], LL. activitas.] The state or quality of being active; nimbleness; agility; vigorous action or operation; energy; active force; as, an increasing variety of human activities. ``The activity of toil.'' --Palfrey. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Liveliness; briskness; quickness. [1913 Webster]
